articles.author: Nell Mackenzie, Dhara Ranasinghe
articles.title: Weak PMIs, Spain keep Europe sour but fail to dent US sentiment - Reuters.com
articles.description: European stocks slipped while U.S. stock futures rose, as weak EU business activity data and an inconclusive Spanish election result could not deter U.S. optimism that the end of central bank rate hikes is approaching.
